item.title: Rethinking the Way You Think
item.description:
• What’s Due?

What’s Due?

eCampus Slack Description Location
Take the Considering Program Evaluation survey Link1
Read two articles and create postings Link
Respond to the #pictures-of-evaluation post Link
Describe a definition of evaluation you identify with Link
Assess logistics when considering possible teammates Link

  1. Unique link sent to your WVU Mix e-mail account.↩︎

Respond to the posts on #evaluation-politicization and #which-values Link

item.title: Making Sense and Interpreting Nonsense
item.description:
• What’s Due?

What’s Due?

eCampus Slack Description Location
Respond to the posts on #important-criteria and #merit-disagreement Link
Read two chapters in your book Link
Write two posts on #views-on-synthesis and #including-kec-parts Link
Read a paper on theory-driven evaluations and post on #tde Link
Plan to meet with me after recieving approval of your proposal, but prior to implementing the evaluation Link
Take a look at a one-pager comparing three different types of evaluations Link
Review the differences between goal-free and goal-based evaluations Link
Go through the slideshow on standards based evaluations Link
Submit your Needs Assessment by the end of this week! Link
Start writing your Evaluation Proposal Link
Take a look at some extra materials on needs assessments Link
